snippet: Immigration officials overwhelmed by a flood of women and children from Central America are housing hundreds of unaccompanied boys and girls in a makeshift detention center.
lead_paragraph: Immigration officials overwhelmed by a flood of women and children from Central America are housing hundreds of unaccompanied boys and girls in a makeshift detention center.

headline.main: Child Migrants Strain Makeshift Arizona Shelter
headline.print_headline: Child Migrants Strain Makeshift Arizona Shelter
